name: Shaolin Master - Free Kung Fu Karate Action Game
name_original: Shaolin Master - Free Kung Fu Karate Action Game
description:
Do you have what it takes to become a Shaolin master?

Shaolin Master is a great action karate Kung fu high-scores game in which you must try to survive as long as possible while striking back the ninja stars! Watch out for increasing speed of the stars! Can you make it into TOP20 in global leaderboards and become a Shaolin Master?

How to play: Tap on the left and right part of the screen to strike back the stars! Survive as long as possible! Watch out for increasing speed! Submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the best Shaolin master!

Features:
* global high-score, you challenge people all around the world
* beautiful cartoon graphics
* simple but addicting gameplay
* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases
* karate kung-fu ninja theme
